enhanced_description: Roti Sai Mai is a beloved delightful sweet treat from central Thailand that gentle on the palate. Thai cotton candy wrapped in thin roti from Ayutthaya. This hard recipe takes about 30 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Central Thai cuisine balances sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavors perfectly. The combination of flour, sugar, food coloring creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
